title: Power generation density boost of bifacial tandem solar cells revealed by high throughput optoelectrical modelling
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6068-6078
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01173B, Paper
Jiahong Tang, Junfeng Xue, Huaiwang Xu, Yujing Li, Shuping Lin, Boyan Li, Dalong Zhong, Gang Li, Yan Jiang, Qi Chen
A high-throughput optoelectrical simulation method is developed to reveal the energy yield of bifacial perovskite/Cu(In,Ga)Se2 tandem solar cells.
